short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JackDB is a secure, collaborative environment for your team's SQL queries and data-driven insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Query and analyze any database in the cloud with industry-standard SQL, right in your browser.

JackDB has everything you want in a database client, including syntax highlighting, code formatting, intelligent auto completion, query profiling, visual execution plans, and query optimization, and much more.

Supported Databases:
• PostgreSQL
• MySQL
• MariaDB
• Oracle
• SQL Server

Supported Platforms:
• Amazon RDS
• Amazon Redshift
• Heroku Postgres

Sign up for FREE today!
